title: PacMan AI
description:
AI based intelligent agent to control pacman in different environments.

            The pacman plays against the ghosts and tries to eat all food while staying safe from ghosts

            and finishing in minimum time.
            The pacman uses different methods like A* Search, Heuristics, Reinforcement Learning with different parameters.

title: Automatic Review Analyzer
description: Sentiment Analysis for customer reviews. Using simple perceptron algorithm

title: MNIST Digit Recognition
description: Classification of digits using support vector machine and gradient descent.

title: Overlapping Digit Recognition
description: Classification of overlapping digits which contain multiple digits in single image, where a digit is written over other digit, using Convolutional Neural Networks.

title: Collaborative Filtering via Gaussian Mixtures
description:
Recommender system for Netflix using Gaussian Mixtures models and EM algorithm.

        Ratings of few users for different movies are provided as input and ratings for movies for which
        user has not rated is calculated. It achieves very nice accuracy.

title: Text game using Reinforcement Learning
description:
It is a game in which a robot is given task in a room and he learns to play it.
            Implementations using Q learning, Q learning with approximations, using neural networks to reduce the exponential size Q Tables.

title: Maze Solver
description: Demonstration of complexity, speed, effectiveness of different search algorithms

title: Degrees
description:
Calculation of minimum degree of separation between actors in holywood.
            Separation is in terms of working together.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe AI
description: MiniMax and Alpha-Beta pruning based undefeatable Intelligent to play against human.

title: Minesweeper AI
description: Knowledge based Intelligent agent to play Minesweeper which reasons using preposotional logic.

title: CSP solver for Crossword Puzzle
description:
Solves Crossword puzzles by modelling it into Constraint satisfaction problem and then using
        backtracking search with different heuristics to improve performance

title: Pabilistic models for reasoning under uncertainity
description: To demonstrate page ranking and gene inheritance, by sampeling and using bayes-net

title: Shopping
description: K Nearest Neighbour model to predict whether customer will make the purchase or not.

title: NIM
description: Playing NIM against human. Trained using reinforcement learning.

title: Traffic Sign classification
description: CNN model for 43 class classification of traffic sign boards

title: CS50 Wiki
description:
Mini version of WikiPedia with almost all features of wikipedia.

        Built using django, html, jinja, css, saas.

title: HomePage
description:
My Homepage which contails details about me like hobbies, interests, and many things more.

        Built using flask, HTML, CSS, Javascript.

title: CS50-Finance
description:
A lite app to get quotes of stocks and to perform buy, sell stocks.

        Technologies used: Flask, SQL, APIs, JSON, Heroku, GIT.
